thread.title: Cleveland Indians' Terry Francona says Carlos Carrasco will start Game 2 vs. Texas Rangers
thread.title_full: Cleveland Indians' Terry Francona says Carlos Carrasco will start Game 2 vs. Texas Rangers

author: Paul Hoynes, cleveland.com
title: Cleveland Indians' Terry Francona says Carlos Carrasco will start Game 2 vs. Texas Rangers
text: There was speculation that Carlos Carrasco might open the year on the disabled list because of a sore right elbow and a lack of spring-training innings, but manager Terry Francona said Monday he would pitch Game 2 of the regular season on April 4 against Texas.
